sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'; import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './LoginRegister.css'; export default class Login extends Component { handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); const data = { user_Name: this.userName, password: this.password } axios.post('http://localhost:8000/login', data) .then(res => { localStorage.setItem('token, res.token'); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) }; render() { return (
this.firstName = e.target.value} />
this.lastName = e.target.value} />
this.middleName = e.target.value} />
this.phone = e.target.value} />
this.email = e.target.value} />
this.address = e.target.value} />
this.userName = e.target.value} />
this.password = e.target.value} />
this.confirmPassword = e.target.value} />
) } }
